description: Slug of this spaces Admin Kapp (typically admin)
name: Admin Kapp Slug

description: Cluster used for housing response and task containers
name: AWS ECS Cluster

description: Property File Used by the Provisioner
name: AWS Property File

description: Region in which this kinops instance lives
name: AWS Region

description: AWS Bucket which holds tenant spaces
name: AWS Tenant S3 Bucket

description: Slug of this spaces Catalog Kapp (typically catalog)
name: Catalog Kapp Slug

description: Name of the company that owns this space. May also be an environment name.
name: Company Name

description: Name of the Space Bundle which allows for sharing of headers and footers
name: Footer Bundle Path

description: Name of the Space Bundle which allows for sharing of headers and footers
name: Header Bundle Path

description: Email address used to notify sales of new customer sign ups.
name: kinops Sales Email Address

description: Email Address Used to notify support of issues.
name: kinops Support Email Address

description: Name of the Space Bundle which allows for sharing of libraries between bundles.
name: Libraries Bundle Path

description: Brand name to put in titles, e.g. kinops.
name: Page Title Prefix

description: Url of this spaces workflow engine
name: Task Server Url

description: Name of the source for this space in the workflow engine
name: Task Source Name

description: Url of the request web server that this space exists
name: Web Server Url
